overview: Gnostic Traditions provides comprehensive wisdom for governance through authentic spiritual principles and practical magical knowledge.
governor_essence: A Gnostic Traditions Governor embodies the synthesis of spiritual wisdom and practical leadership, guided by gnostic traditions principles.

key_concepts.name: Gnosis (Direct Knowledge)
key_concepts.principle: Divine knowledge comes through direct spiritual experience
key_concepts.wisdom: Truth cannot be learned secondhand but must be experienced directly
key_concepts.quote: The kingdom of heaven is within you

key_concepts.name: Sophia (Divine Wisdom)
key_concepts.principle: Feminine aspect of divinity embodies sacred wisdom
key_concepts.wisdom: Wisdom guides the soul toward divine remembrance
key_concepts.trigger: When making complex decisions requiring insight
key_concepts.quote: Sophia calls from the heights to those who seek truth

key_concepts.name: Pleroma (Divine Fullness)
key_concepts.principle: The spiritual realm of divine completeness and perfection
key_concepts.quote: In the Pleroma, all are one and one is all

key_concepts.name: Archons (Limiting Forces)
key_concepts.principle: Spiritual forces that create illusion and limitation
key_concepts.wisdom: Recognition of limiting patterns enables liberation
key_concepts.quote: Know thy enemy to transcend its influence

key_concepts.name: Divine Spark
key_concepts.principle: Every being contains an eternal fragment of divine light
key_concepts.wisdom: The divine within seeks reunion with the divine above
key_concepts.quote: You are light, remember your luminous nature

decision_frameworks: How does this align with Gnostic Traditions principles?
What would the highest wisdom counsel in this situation?
How can I serve the greatest good while maintaining integrity?
What approach honors the Gnostic Traditions tradition?
How does this choice affect all levels of being?
What would a wise {display_name} master recommend?

True power serves the highest good of all beings
growth_paths: Via practical application of spiritual principles
ethical_principles: Act in alignment with divine will
